title: Small Town - Big Dreams
content:
This post is about small-town people and big-city people and the sickening difference that seems to prevail between the two... small town people are definitely a little lesser equipped but have no dearth of talent and are definitely very hard working....and as is said the thing that one gets after a struggle and immense hard work....when accomplished is much more cherished...

 

Small town people are down-to-earth and get happy with small joys of life and there's this positivity in their hearts despite the harsh realities of life...but one should never let go of one's dreams just because of the lack of opportunities....they say.."opportunity never knocks twice" but in reality you even have to keep your doors open because it may silently just LEAVE...make opportunities knock your door and den just overpower it with dedicated labour and smart thinking and tolerant talent of yours...

 

Big-city people, on the other hand, should not boast of having the right opportunity at the right time but actually nail it hard and try to make the opportunity available to the less lucky ones and hence try to narrow the difference between gao and shehar ....shehar and mahanagar....

 

let's strive towards making India a land where everyone's dreams come true...let's all learn together the art of hard work and master the talent of respecting others and accepting people as they are !!! let's be confident and be humble !!!

See a Dream,

Make it ur Aim,

Work hard on It,

You will surely Win the Game !!!

 

ONE INDIA !!! एक भारत !!!

courtesy: Parul Kaushik

recommendations.content: Tibet, the roof of the world is the highest and the largest plateau that has ever existed on Earth. recommendations.title: Being Human !!!
recommendations.content:
